entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as being next to Lupin, with a pale face and graying hair.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as having a pale face, graying hair, and wearing a long and threadbare overcoat.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as being dressed in his 'Muggle best'.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as being dressed in her 'Muggle best' and hugging her children tightly.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as wearing a brand-new jacket made of 'finest dragon skin'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as wearing a brand-new jacket made of 'finest dragon skin'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as goggling at the twins' new clothes.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as being hugged tightly by her mother.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being hugged tightly by Mrs. Weasley and lying about his well-being.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being greeted by Mrs. Weasley.
